name: Shelter Program
description: Hospitality House's Shelter offers 25 90-day, case-managed beds and five emergency spaces to 650 – 700+ adult men each year. Hospitality House’s Shelter is the smallest shelter for men in San Francisco, allowing for personal, respectful, and high-quality services. Residents represent a highly-diverse population, comprised of veterans, immigrants and refugees, people with mental health issues, seniors, and ex-offenders.
